item.title: InitializationApiCopRule
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.ApiCop.Rules Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class InitializationApiCopRule : ApiCopRule Base types ApiCopRule Rule to show that classes should be initialized at startup. Constructors InitializationApiCopRule(string name, string description, ApiCopRuleLevel level, InitializationMode recommendedInitializationMode, string url) Initializes a new instance of the InitializationApiCopRule class.

item.title: InitializationMode

Fields Eager 1 The eager. Lazy 0 The lazy.
